example.code:
PS C:\> $OLockConfig = Get-S3ObjectLockConfiguration -BucketName 's3buckettesting' PS C:\> $OLockConfig.ObjectLockEnabled
Value ----- Enabled
PS C:\> $OLockConfig.Rule.DefaultRetention
Days Mode Years ---- ---- ----- 1 GOVERNANCE 0
example.description: This command returns an object with details about the Object lock configuration of the given S3 bucket.
